notes.text:
FIRST!!!
After losing the rankup match to KoG on the 24th win, I kinda tilted and kept losing the streak on 3rd or 4rth win for a while. Finally did it on the 43th win.
The deck have some potential, but there are 2 big problems: Divine Wrath and the fact that people can't read the cards. I won some games just because my opponent thought they could just do Whale on Geargianchor. 
That wont last long.
Btw, I'm gonna play it tomorrow on my stream :^)
